name: Swagger Media
tagline: We embrace our passion for production.
description: At Swagger Media, we are passionate about storytelling. We are a full-service creative agency that is proud to offer production, animation, and digital and traditional marketing services to help businesses share the important narratives that set their brand apart from the rest. We partner with businesses to reach new levels of success through creative and strategic solutions. We work with every industry, from oil and gas to healthcare, from retail to entertainment.
